description.value: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial. You gain @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Dancing Lights]{Dancing Lights} and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound} as primal innate cantrips. If you have the grig heritage, you also gain @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic}, and if you have the draxie heritage, you gain @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Prestidigitation]{Prestidigitation}.
